english.segment1: Jesus Jesus. Holy One, God's precious Son. You gave
english.segment2: Jesus Jesus. On the cross You took my shame. Forever from my heart I'll say
english.segment3: I live to worship You, Lord. My King of glory. Brought me to life. Gave me wings to fly. You are holy. Heaven and earth declare Your praise. Both now and evermore. I glorify Your name
english.segment4: Jesus Jesus. On the cross You took my sin. Forever from my heart I'll sing
english.segment5: You are holy. Glorify Your name. Jesus Jesus Jesus. I glorify Your name.
